name: Solitaire Zone
description:
Solitaire game or Klondike Solitaire ,also called Patience doesn't need's description because it's well known in the whole World!

This game gives you the classic game experience &That IS ,without undo,help bubbles or any hints,winning deals,timed mode.
It's just simple game that gives you the feel of close to real Old Solitaire game when you played alone at your home with real cards! 

Because we think that is no better then old and Classic way of playing the Solitaire game without any virtual help!

Tired from other Solitaire games that are fake and staged with repeating same games again and again? fake high scores and multiplayer's ? then..
Join us in play of this classic game and enjoy it!!
